alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 20 at 8:33AM CST until December 20 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...At least pockets of visibility down to around one-quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Fillmore and Thayer Counties, including the Highway 81 corridor. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog was reported as still occurring in the Geneva area as of 820 AM. Temperatures this morning are near or below freezing across the advisory area. In areas of thicker fog, these temperatures could result in the development of slick spots, especially on elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
